DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Monoclonal antibody locate cancer cell either kill deliver cancer-killing substance without harm normal cell . PURPOSE : Phase I trial study effectiveness monoclonal antibody therapy treat patient refractory advanced solid tumor lymphoma .
DOC.brief_title: Monoclonal Antibody Therapy Treating Patients With Refractory Advanced Solid Tumors Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) monoclonal antibody anti-alpha V beta 3 integrin ( MEDI 522 ) patient refractory advanced solid tumor lymphoma . - Determine safety tolerability drug patient . - Demonstrate significant binding drug molecular target vivo patient . - Determine effect drug angiogenesis patient . - Determine antitumor activity drug measure tumor size glucose uptake patient . - Determine pharmacokinetics drug patient . - Determine recommend phase II dose drug base either MTD optimal biologic response patient . OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study . Patients receive monoclonal antibody anti-alpha V beta 3 integrin ( Medi 522 ) IV 30 minute weekly . Courses repeat every 4 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Cohorts 6 patient receive escalate dos Medi 522 maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) determine . The MTD define dose precede least 2 6 patient experience dose-limiting toxicity . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 6-30 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically cytologically confirm solid tumor lymphoma refractory currently available standard therapy curative therapy No known brain metastasis PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age 18 Performance status ECOG 02 Life expectancy More 12 week Hematopoietic WBC least 3,000/mm^3 Absolute neutrophil count least 1,500/mm^3 Platelet count least 100,000/mm^3 No prior bleed disorder Hepatic Bilirubin normal AST/ALT great 2.5 time upper limit normal INR/PTT normal Renal Creatinine normal OR Creatinine clearance least 60 mL/min Cardiovascular No symptomatic congestive heart failure No unstable angina pectoris No cardiac arrhythmia Other Not pregnant nursing Negative pregnancy test Fertile patient must use effective contraception 6 month study participation HIV negative T4 thyroid stimulate hormone normal No thyroid disease No prior allergic reaction attribute compound similar chemical biologic composition study drug ( e.g. , rituximab immunoglobulin G ) No ongoing active infection No uncontrolled concurrent illness would preclude study participation No psychiatric illness social situation would preclude study participation PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy Not specify Chemotherapy More 4 week since prior chemotherapy ( 6 week nitrosoureas mitomycin ) recover Endocrine therapy Not specify Radiotherapy More 4 week since prior radiotherapy recover Surgery More 4 week since prior surgery Other No concurrent investigational agent No concurrent anticancer agent therapy ( commercial investigational )
